languages.text: Вы пробуждаетесь от неспокойного сна на жесткой картонной подстилке. Вокруг все тот же мрак и нестерпимая вонь чужих тел. Кто-то спотыкается о вашу ногу и, бранясь, хватает за шиворот. Это блюстительница, патрулирующая пустотный корабль. И она явно вами недовольна. Опять.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец пробуждается от неспокойного сна на жесткой картонной подстилке. Вокруг все тот же мрак и нестерпимая вонь чужих тел. Кто-то спотыкается о вашу ногу и, бронясь, хватает за шиворот. Это стражница, патрулирующая пустотный корабль. И она явно вами недовольна. Опять.

languages.text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.
languages.original_text: Вы пробуждаетесь от неспокойного сна на жесткой картонной подстилке. Вокруг все тот же мрак и нестерпимая вонь чужих тел. Кто-то спотыкается о вашу ногу и, бранясь, хватает за шиворот. Это блюстительница, патрулирующая пустотный корабль. И она явно вами недовольна. Опять.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader awakes from uneasy dreams on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround {mf|him|her}. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by your collar, mouthing abuse. It's the guard patrolling the voidship. And she's clearly displeased with you. Again.

The Rogue Trader awakes from uneasy dreams on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround {mf|him|her}. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by your collar, mouthing abuse. It's the guard patrolling the voidship. And she's clearly displeased with you. Again.

The Rogue Trader awakes from uneasy dreams on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround {mf|him|her}. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by your collar, mouthing abuse. It's the guard patrolling the voidship. And she's clearly displeased with you. Again.

The Rogue Trader awakes after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround {mf|him|her}. Someone trips over the Rogue Trader's leg and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

The Rogue Trader awakes after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround {mf|him|her}. Someone trips over the Rogue Trader's leg and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

languages.text: 你睡得非常不舒服。醒来后，你发现自己身处同样的黑暗之中，空气中同样充满了长年不洗澡的人散发出来的体臭。某个人被你的腿绊了一下，这个人随后抓住你的领子，吐出了一大串谩骂。这一次，又是那个在虚空舰上巡逻的执法者，而且很显然，她看起来又相当不满。
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

traits.locale_text: 你睡得非常不舒服。醒来后，你发现自己身处同样的黑暗之中，空气中同样充满了长年不洗澡的人散发出来的体臭。某个人被你的腿绊了一下，这个人随后抓住你的领子，吐出了一大串谩骂。这一次，又是那个在虚空舰上巡逻的执法者，而且很显然，她看起来又相当不满。

languages.text: Despiertas de otro sueño intranquilo sobre una dura esterilla de cartón. Te rodean la misma oscuridad total y la misma peste a sudor. Alguien se tropieza con tu pierna y te levanta por la ropa, insultándote a gritos. Es la guardia de patrulla, claramente irritada. Otra vez.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente despierta de otro sueño intranquilo sobre una dura esterilla de cartón. {mf|Le|La} rodean la misma oscuridad total y la misma peste a sudor. Alguien se tropieza con su pierna y {mf|le|la} levanta por la ropa, insultándo{mf|le|la} a gritos. Es la guardia de patrulla, claramente irritada. Otra vez.

languages.text: あなたは硬い段ボールの上で、浅い眠りから目を覚ました。辺りは真っ暗闇で、風呂に入っていない人間の耐えがたい悪臭が漂う。何者かがあなたはの足につまづき、襟をつかんで罵声を浴びせる。警備中の執行官だ。明らかに機嫌が良くない。またか。
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

traits.locale_text: 硬い段ボールの上で、ローグトレーダーは浅い眠りから目を覚ました。辺りは真っ暗闇で、風呂に入っていない人間の耐えがたい悪臭が漂う。何者かがローグトレーダーの足につまづき、襟をつかんで罵声を浴びせる。警備中の執行官だ。明らかに機嫌が良くない。またか。

languages.text: Nach einem unruhigen Schlaf erwachst du auf einem steifen Stück Karton. Du bist von derselben undurchdringlichen Dunkelheit und den Gestank ungewaschener Leiber umgeben. Jemand stolpert über dein Bein, packt dich am Kragen und beleidigt dich. Es ist die patrouillierende Enforcerin. Und sie ist offensichtlich wütend. Mal wieder.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem unruhigen Schlaf erwachst du auf einem steifen Stück Karton. Du bist von derselben undurchdringlichen Dunkelheit und den Gestank ungewaschener Leiber umgeben. Jemand stolpert über dein Bein, packt dich am Kragen und beleidigt dich. Es ist die patrouillierende Enforcerin. Und sie ist offensichtlich wütend. Mal wieder.

{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} erwacht nach einem unruhigen Schlaf auf einem steifen Stück Karton, noch immer umgeben von derselben Dunkelheit und demselben unerträglichen Gestank ungewaschener Körper. Jemand stolpert über das Bein {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, packt {mf|ihn|sie} am Kragen und beleidigt {mf|ihn|sie} aufs Übelste. Es ist die Enforcerin auf Patrouille. Und sie ist offensichtlich sehr verärgert. Erneut.

languages.text: Vous vous réveillez après un sommeil agité sur un matelas en carton rigide. La même obscurité et la même puanteur insoutenable de corps sales vous entourent. Quelqu'un trébuche sur vous et vous attrape par le cou, avant de vous hurler dessus. C'est la prévote qui patrouille. Et elle est clairement contrariée. Encore une fois.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se réveille après un sommeil agité sur un matelas en carton rigide. La même obscurité et la même puanteur insoutenable de corps sales l'entourent. Quelqu'un trébuche sur {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et l'attrape par le cou, avant de lui cracher dessus. C'est l'exécutante qui patrouille. Et elle est clairement contrariée. Encore une fois.

languages.text: Huzursuz bir uykunun ardından sert, karton bir yüzeyde uyanıyorsun. Etrafını aynı zifirî karanlık ve yıkanmamış vücutların dayanılmaz pis kokusu sarıyor. Birisi bacağına takılıp yıkılıyor ve seni yakandan tutarak küfürler savuruyor. Bu, devriye gezen infazcı. Hoşnutsuz olduğu çok açık. Yine.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep on a stiff cardboard mat. The same pitch darkness and unbearable stench of unwashed bodies surround you. Someone trips over your leg and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is the enforcer on patrol. And she is clearly displeased. Again.
